reference: Backus, David K.; Patrick J. Kehoe; and, Finn E. Kydland, 1992, International real business cycles, Journal of Political Economy 101, 745-775.

Betts, Caroline, and Michael B. Devereux, 2000, Exchange rate dynamics in a model of pricing-to-market, Journal of International Economics 50, 215-244.
Evans, Carolyn, 2000, The economic significance of national border effects, working paper, Federal Reserve Bank of New York.
Evans, Martin D.D., and Richard K. Lyons, 1999, Order flow and exchange rate dynamics, National Bureau of Economic Research, working paper no. 7317.
Jeanne, Olivier, and Andrew K. Rose, 1999, Noise trading and exchange rate regimes, National Bureau of Economic Research, working paper no. 7104.
Kollman, Robert, 1995, Consumption, real exchange rates and the structure of international asset markets, Journal of International Money and Finance 14, 191- 211.
